about_the_game:
Step into the colorful and challenging world of VR, where your task is to pop all the balloons using precision throwing darts. "I Hate Balloons" is an engaging single-player game that will take you through dynamic levels filled with surprising obstacles.

In "I Hate Balloons," players progress through various levels, each presenting new challenges. Equipped with a limited number of darts, you must aim precisely and pop all the balloons to advance to the next stage.

Throwing Darts: Focus and aim accurately to hit all the balloons on the screen.
Power-ups and Obstacles: Utilize various power-ups like bombs and energy trampolines to ease your task. Watch out for obstacles that can hinder your aim.
Dart Generator: Keep track of your dart resources with the generator, which displays the number of remaining possible dart throws.


Immersive VR Gameplay: Experience interactive gameplay in virtual reality, making you feel as if you're in a real-world setting.
Varied Challenges: Each level introduces new obstacles and challenges that will test your precision and strategic skills.
Cheerful Visuals: Enjoy the colorful and vibrant graphics that create a light and pleasant atmosphere.
Casual Fun: Perfect for short gaming sessions, providing lots of joy and satisfaction with every successful hit.
Great for VR Beginners: "I Hate Balloons" is an excellent choice for those who are new to VR, offering intuitive controls and easy-to-understand mechanics.

name: I Hate Balloons VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 or better
  • VR Support: Requires a VR headset compatible with SteamVR

short_description: "I Hate Balloons" is a VR single-player game where you pop all the balloons with limited darts. Use power-ups like bombs and trampolines to overcome obstacles. Perfect for VR beginners!
